testcase.name: CompanySearch Integration Tests > should integrate with store and service for end-to-end search flow
CompanySearch Integration Tests > should handle full search workflow with error recovery
CompanySearch > Rendering > should render search input with placeholder
CompanySearch > Rendering > should render search icon initially
CompanySearch > Rendering > should render with proper accessibility attributes
CompanySearch > User Interaction > should update input value when user types
CompanySearch > User Interaction > should show clear button when input has value
CompanySearch > User Interaction > should clear input when clear button is clicked
CompanySearch > User Interaction > should not show clear button when input is empty
CompanySearch > Search Functionality > should trigger search after debounce delay
CompanySearch > Search Functionality > should not trigger search for queries less than 2 characters
CompanySearch > Search Functionality > should clear search when input is empty
CompanySearch > Search Functionality > should show loading state during search
CompanySearch > Search Results Display > should display search results when available
CompanySearch > Search Results Display > should display singular result text for single result
CompanySearch > Search Results Display > should display company details correctly
CompanySearch > Search Results Display > should handle company selection click
CompanySearch > Search Results Display > should display different status styles
CompanySearch > Error Handling > should handle search errors gracefully
CompanySearch > Error Handling > should handle network errors
CompanySearch > Performance > should debounce search requests
CompanySearch > Performance > should cancel previous search when new search is triggered
CompanyRegistration > renders the registration form with all required fields
CompanyRegistration > has correct default values
CompanyRegistration > validates required fields
